## PopulatableEthers class

Ethers-based implementation of [PopulatableProtocol](./stablecoin-lib-base.populatableprotocol.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PopulatableEthers implements PopulatableProtocol<EthersTransactionReceipt, EthersTransactionResponse, EthersPopulatedTransaction> 
```
**Implements:** [PopulatableProtocol](./stablecoin-lib-base.populatableprotocol.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [EthersTransactionResponse](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherstransactionresponse.md)<!-- -->, [EthersPopulatedTransaction](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherspopulatedtransaction.md)<!-- -->&gt;
